Name: Welcome Back To 2007
About the game: Would you say that 2007 cannot be returned? But after 11 long years, 2007 is coming back to us! Welcome Back To 2007, is an old-school platformer game. Features: ■ 2007 beautiful achievements; ■ 30 different levels; ■ Cool plot; ■ Original soundtrack by Anacom; ■ Jetpack working on a real physical model; ■ Difficulty lowered in Spring 2020. And added many checkpoints; ■ Also, the game has been heavily updated and reworked, a new cutscene has been added; ■ The final boss fight has been completely remastered. You play as Emo Boy, who bridge over the difficulties to achieve his sacred wishes. Evil grandmas, chavs, security guards, goths, weeaboos and haters appear on his way. But our EmoBoy will never surrender! With help of tears, literally, he smashes his way: plunge your enemies into shock by shooting them with your tears. You need to collect cigarettes in order to replenish your Jetpack stock! Your main companion and mentor is Girl with Guitar. She will not let you get bored and always will help you with advice on any trouble!
